name: sb-hacks-interview-agent
description: A Node.js starter application for Deepgram's Voice Agent API

scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install && cd ..
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && pnpm run dev -- --no-open --logLevel error
scripts.cleanup: pkill -f 'node.*server.js' || true; pkill -f nodemon || true; pkill -f vite || true; fuser -k 3000/tcp 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev:clean: pnpm run cleanup && pnpm run dev
scripts.security-check:all: pnpm run security-check && cd frontend && pnpm run security-check && cd ..

author: Deepgram DX Team <devrel@deepgram.com> (https://developers.deepgram.com)
